aboutMe.p1: I am a <c>Web Developer</c> based in the <c>Basque Country</c>. I consider myself a <c>problem-solver</c>, very <c>motivated</c>, passionate about <c>new technologies</c>, and constantly <c>evolving</c> and <c>learning</c>.
aboutMe.p2: I am deeply passionate about programming, enjoy <c>new challenges</c> and care deeply about <c>correct development</c>, <c>clean code</c> and <c>best practices</c> in my projects.
aboutMe.p3: Even though I live in <c>Spain</c>, I am open to working anywhere in the world. I speak <c>English</c> and would love to practice it!

oreka.title: Full Stack Web Developer
oreka.description: Full Stack web development and UI/UX design of React and Next.js-based cross-platform applications integrated with SAP systems and business management solutions.

gestioma.title: Full Stack Web Developer
gestioma.description: Full-stack web development of React and Next.js-based applications related to Civil Engineering, 3D modeling, and BIM systems.

taskManager.p1: A task management application that allows users to create, organize, and delete tasks within customizable lists.
taskManager.p2: Includes a simple yet fully functional authentication system.

portfolio.p1: Portfolio of Alex Gutierrez (this website). A complete rework of the previous version, which was an outdated single-page application.
portfolio.p2: The goal was to create a cleaner, more elegant, minimalist design with improved responsiveness and enhanced accessibility (themes, translations, etc.).

videogameDatabase.title: Videogame Database
videogameDatabase.p1: An information platform covering all types of video games.
videogameDatabase.p2: It integrates the rawg.io API to retrieve comprehensive data, including Metacritic scores.

employeeManager.title: Employee Manager
employeeManager.p1: An employee management system that allows creation, editing, deletion, and storage of users, each assigned specific roles.
employeeManager.p2: Backed by a Java (Spring Boot) API and a MySQL database.

pkmnWeight.title: How much does my Pokémon weigh?
pkmnWeight.p1: Developed as a simple and efficient tool to dynamically determine the weight of any Pokémon.
pkmnWeight.p2: Automatically updates with new entries from each game release, leveraging the PokeAPI to stay updated.
